raw_comment:
Notice- I notice that the players of color is higher than the coaches of color
Wonder- I wonder why the numbers for head coaches of color is so low for the national football league
Impact- it is more difficult for people of color to become coaches 
Headline- the diversity in sports
ace_sentences: I notice that the number of players of color is higher than the number of coaches of color.
I wonder why the number of head coaches of color in the National Football League is low.
It is more difficult for a person of color to become a coach.
The headline is: The diversity in sports.
